name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia, are you drinking again......
A thick scent of Alcohol is definitely wafting from Cordelia's body. However, from her frightened, almost tearful expression, there's nothing at all that reminds me of a drunk person.

name: Jonathan
message: What's wrong?
You don't have to cry just because I'm a little late for our promise, right？
Cordelia clasps her hands tightly in front of her body, shrinking herself as if to suppress her trembling.
This isn't normal.
I wonder what happened while I was waiting.

name: Jonathan
message: コーデリア！
Just where have you been?

name: Cordelia
message: ジョナサン‥‥‥‥‥
I’ve been waiting this whole time......

name: Jonathan
message: Don't you think it's way too reckless for a young girl to be out walking alone at this hour?！

name: Jonathan
message: Do you know how worried I was?

name: Cordelia
message: I'm sorry.
I waited for so long, but you didn't come, Jonathan.

name: Jonathan
message: Even so, that doesn't mean it's okay to do something this dangerous.
Cordelia clenches both her hands so tight they turn white, looking at me like she's about to cry.
Maybe I went a little overboard with the drug.
Since I was late for our promised time, it's not like I'm completely blameless...
Cordelia isn't in the room, which doesn't have much stuff.
Looks like they haven't come back yet.
She's not the kind of girl who'd break her promise with me and just go off somewhere, and besides, I can't imagine there's anywhere she'd have to go at this hour.....
I wonder if I've gotten myself caught up in something troublesome again after all.
Maybe we should go look for them.
It's Cordelia's room on the second floor of the Pub.
The room, which doesn't really have much stuff in it, feels even more spacious with its owner gone.
Considering that it's been moderately warmed up, I don't think it's been that long since Cordelia left the room.
It feels like she just stepped out for a quick errand, but there's no way any store would be open this late at night in this Arkham.
Where did Cordelia go?
いっその事、コーデリアを待たずに寝てしまいたいところだが、そういう訳にもいかない。
古びてはいるものの、コーデリアの養父母の代から使っていたという程ではない。
おそらく、コーデリアが自分でこの部屋に運び込んだ物なのだろう。
There don't seem to be many pieces of furniture left that could be called memories of my adoptive parents.
It's a barely-there window, just big enough to let the breeze through.
This room, which exists almost just for sleeping, might be fine like this.
It doesn't really look like it gets much sunlight.
There's a window, just barely enough to let some air through the room.
Looks like there's nothing like a terrace in this room, but I wonder if Cordelia doesn't mind.
It's not a replica, but it doesn't really seem valuable either.
It doesn't really seem to match Cordelia's hobbies though......
In this room that's lacking in things like decorations, it's the only thing that really stands out.
It doesn't seem to be a replica of a famous writer's work, but it doesn't look very valuable either.
It's probably something an unknown painter who visited the pub drew as a way to pass the time instead of paying for booze.
It doesn't really match Cordelia's hobbies either.
It's not like I actually like it, but I can’t just throw it away either, so it’s got that vibe of something I ended up putting in my room just because I had no choice……
It's just an ordinary dressing table.
It's all neatly put away, so I can't tell what kind of cosmetics Cordelia usually uses.
Everything is neatly put away, so there's no way to tell what kind of cosmetics Cordelia usually uses.
I could open the drawer and take a look inside, but I doubt there's anything all that interesting in there.
Cordelia never really put that much effort into making herself look beautiful in the first place.
To be this scared, just what the hell happened to you？
It's hard to believe that Cordelia, who's lived all alone until now, has such a delicate side to her.
Shaking all over, looking at me with scared eyes.
There's no way I could just leave her alone and go back to the Fish Scale Inn.
Cordelia is looking at me with a face that looks like she's about to cry any second.
The hands clasped together in front of her chest are so tightly gripped, they've turned white.
Shivering from the cold, they look just like a puppy caught in the rain-it almost makes me feel sorry just watching them.
Was it really that shocking that I was late for our promised time？
I just can't believe that's all there is...

name: Cordelia
message: Aren't you worried about me？

name: Jonathan
message: Why does it have to be like that?
I came here like this because I was worried about you, didn’t I?

name: Cordelia
message: No, it feels like you're really not into this！
Sure, we can go back to the Fish Scale Inn.

name: Jonathan
message: I'm not bothered at all.
I'll stay here with you all night.

name: Cordelia
message: That's enough, go home！

name: Jonathan
message: Why are you being so unreasonable！

name: Jonathan
message: I love you.
That's why I went out of my way to come see you like this, isn't it?

name: Cordelia
message: Really？

name: Jonathan
message: You're pretty suspicious, huh.

name: Cordelia
message: Can I really trust you？

name: Jonathan
message: I went to the Church too, but I didn't see you there.　　　　　　　　Looks like we just missed each other.

name: Cordelia
message: What were you doing in a place like that！
It's dangerous to be walking around the village in the middle of the night, you know.

name: Jonathan
message: Didn't you do the same thing too?
I was just looking it up.

name: Cordelia
message: So, did you see it too？

name: Jonathan
message: You saw it...
Did　you　see　Thomas　and　Nai　talking　about　something？

name: Cordelia
message: What the heck is that？
I didn't see anything like that.

name: Jonathan
message: Figured as much.
Sure, those two aren't normal, but there's no way that would make you scared.

name: Cordelia
message: After I left the church and got onto the road leading to the sea......

name: Cordelia
message: Somehow, all of a sudden... there was this weird smell around.
It was a nasty smell, like rotting fish.

name: Jonathan
message: I know about that.
When I went to the harbor to meet Marsh, it smelled like that there too.

name: Cordelia
message: That wasn't all, though.
There was a weird sound.

name: Jonathan
message: A weird sound... what kind？

name: Cordelia
message: I don't know, I can't explain it well.
It was kinda like the sound of dragging a wet rag.

name: Jonathan
message: Maybe you're just imagining things.

name: Cordelia
message: I thought so at first too, but......
I　got　scared　and　turned　back　to　come　here.

name: Cordelia
message: And then, that sound kept following me the whole time.
No matter how fast I ran, it just wouldn't go away.

name: Jonathan
message: Maybe it was just a prank by someone.
Because you were out walking so late at night, they probably wanted to mess with you a bit.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, I'm really scared......

name: Jonathan
message: Don't worry about it.
You've always been fine up to now, right?

name: Jonathan
message: So what exactly happened？
Were　you　really　that　shocked　that　I　was　late？

name: Cordelia
message: That's not it！

name: Jonathan
message: Calm down.
Try telling me what happened, step by step.

name: Cordelia
message: I-since Jonathan was late coming, I got worried and went outside to check.

name: Jonathan
message: So？

name: Cordelia
message: I went through the back alley and headed toward the Church.
The other day, you were the one who took the wrong way.

name: Jonathan
message: Even someone like me who doesn't know the area wouldn't mess up and take the same wrong road twice.

name: Cordelia
message: "But！"
ずっと待ってたのにあなたは来ないんだもの。

name: Jonathan
message: I get it, it was my fault.
So, what did you do after that?

name: Cordelia
message: And then......
No matter how close we are, it's probably smarter not to barge into Cordelia's privacy with dirty shoes.
It's the only wardrobe in the room.
Cordelia's clothes and stuff are probably inside.
It's not like I want to peek inside or anything......
But it's not like I'm totally uninterested, either.
Go back to the Pub
